channel.title: [Suggestion] Anti-Noob Protection System
channel.description: Well, since tons of noobs come here (when they do not belong) why not have some kind of test before registering? Like a spelling thing. They hear a voice and they have to write what the voice said, more than 3 spelling errors, and they can't register? Perhaps a test to see the difference between private servers and clients as well. It would avoid alot of useless people coming here.

item.title: [Suggestion] Anti-Noob Protection System
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:23, topic:94321”][quote author=Rictoo link=topic=136582.msg1343964#msg1343964 date=1179626255]

Maybe we should change the quiz so that it asks questions about the agreement, and not allow the user to view the agreement more than once.

Yeah, I think before you take the general knowledge quiz, there should be a small quiz asking questions about the TOS.
[/quote][me=sppt]hides[/me]

also, i, among others(most likely), haven’t had to do the quiz, bugged much?[/quote]Same

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Anti-Noob Protection System
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I passed that quiz thing first try, no mistakes, without searching, maybe im not as nooby as i though…?

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Anti-Noob Protection System
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:25, topic:94321”][quote author=Rictoo link=topic=136582.msg1343964#msg1343964 date=1179626255]

Maybe we should change the quiz so that it asks questions about the agreement, and not allow the user to view the agreement more than once.

Yeah, I think before you take the general knowledge quiz, there should be a small quiz asking questions about the TOS.
[/quote]not just the terms of service, Mostly about where to post moparscape questions. After they pass that quiz, then a message should show that says: “Now that you have finished this quiz and passed it, if you post any questions about moparscape or private server related, you will be IP banned.” (one of the questions should be about IP addresses and what they are.)[/quote]

  1. The TOS does talk about where to post moparscape questions.
  2. That IP ban thing is just stupid - and no, the quiz has random questions, so not everyone will get the question about IP’s.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Anti-Noob Protection System
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:22, topic:94321”][quote author=io9 link=topic=136582.msg1338515#msg1338515 date=1179560389]
Maybe we should change the quiz so that it asks questions about the agreement, and not allow the user to view the agreement more than once.
[/quote]

Yeah, I think before you take the general knowledge quiz, there should be a small quiz asking questions about the TOS.[/quote]not just the terms of service, Mostly about where to post moparscape questions. After they pass that quiz, then a message should show that says: “Now that you have finished this quiz and passed it, if you post any questions about moparscape or private server related, you will be IP banned.” (one of the questions should be about IP addresses and what they are.)

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Anti-Noob Protection System
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“zoss0, post:17, topic:94321”][quote author=Starblaster100 link=topic=136582.msg1318493#msg1318493 date=1179152068]
You’d be suprised how many people are having trouble with the quiz:

    Quiz is messed up, and can't run Moparscape
    dot dot dor?   
    bug
    Wtf the quiz is messed (im not asking for answers)
    TO HARD
    Where do you type commands in????   
    it says error connecting to server  
    how do i do it free?   
    bug

And this would just be the accumliation of a few short hours.
[/quote]
Please tell me you didn’t let em regi.

Yea, i had to google a few, like ASCII. But if they are this dumb ^ See quote then…hopefully they can’t google.[/quote]make them take the quiz before they can register or activate their username.

Read full topic
